title: dataset_extension
description: The external references extension to list additional licenses and dataset catagories for a dataset BCO (dsBCO).

additional_license.description: The additional license property contains the details about the licenses applied to the dataset and the script or tool/software used to process the given dataset.

data_license.title: data_license
data_license.description: The license applied to the data or the dataset by the author

script_license.title: script_license
script_license.description: The license applied to the computational script or the tool/software developed to process (parse, QC, align) the input dataset for a final output dataset.

dataset_categories.title: dataset_categories
dataset_categories.description: Dataset categories describe and provide more information about the dataset which can be used to classify, group, sort and filter datasets.

category_value.title: category_value
category_value.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

category_name.title: category_name
category_name.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

extension_schema.title: extension_schema
extension_schema.description: The schema applied to the extension object
